item.description:
Porchai is a little hole in the wall located in Wakefield center, and one of my favorite places to eat. Healthy, satisfying Thai food, friendly staff, and never crowded. Killer Thai iced tea and pad thai. Homemade noodles. Salads with sesame ginger dressing. What more could you want?

...if you were thinking alcohol, unfortunately they do not have a license, but you are free to bring your own beer or wine. There is a liquor store a block away from the restaurant. I think I have some extra beers I can bring. Nothing like a relaxing Thai meal after a hard day's work. Screw it, I'm going alone if no one signs up ;)

Hope to see you all there. Not sure how long I'll keep this group going without adequate interest, so let's make this month kick ass to make it last!!

*suggestion: please bring cash to make the bill paying easier*
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my red t-shirt... the place is real small so it won't be hard
item.name: Yummy food!!
